%s holds cashback up to 45 to 60 days from the date of purchase due to return, refund, and cancellation policies, Once these Policies period over then, it will automatically validate your pending cashback as per terms & Conditions
%s Cashback is applicable only on successful transactions. Any returned, refunded, or canceled transaction or order will not be eligible for a cashback offer.
